dischargeDispositionCode.displayName: Discharge to home or self-care (routine discharge)

tr.td: Right wrist was placed in cast
Cast to be removed in 6 weeks

section.title: Hospital Course
section.text: Patient vital signs were recorded Patient was examined for broken wrist. X-Rays of the right wrist were taken. Radiological interpretation indicated fractured radius. Cast was placed on right wrist. Patient was given ibuprofen, instructions and discharged.

list.item: Patient fell while skating. Suspect fractured radius.
REVIEW OF SYSTEMS: Patient denies all symptoms in all systems except as noted.
GENERAL APPEARANCE: Well developed, well nourished individual in no acute distress.
Retain cast for 6 weeks. Exercise plan thereafter.
